title: I Legitimately Believe Riot Has Me in a Retard Queue
body:
I'm on an absolutely retarded losing streak and the games are completely out of my control. For example
http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2046918693/202627251
Literally NOTHING I can do. I got a 1v4 quadra kill at one point so don't even say "lol carry harder".
What the fuck am I even supposed to do

In one day I've demoted from G3 to G5. WTF?
